mapper.select: SELECT a.fpSeq, a.reservationDate, a.reservationTime, a.matchingOnOff, a.matchingDeposit, a.matchingBankName, a.matchingBankNumbar, a.matchingVs, a.matchingTeamLevel, a.matchingTeamName, a.matchingTeamIntroduction, a.applicationTeamLevel, a.applicationTeamPhoneNumbar, a.applicationTeamName, a.applicationTeamIntroduction, a.rpDelMy, a.user_suSeq, a.futsalInformation_fiSeq, b.fiSeq, b.futsalName, b.futsalPrice, b.futsalRegion, b.futsalAddress, b.futsalPhoneNumbar, b.futsalBusinessHours, b.futsalFacilityUsageRules, b.futsalCancellationPolicy, b.fiDelMy FROM reservationprocess a LEFT JOIN futsalinformation b ON a.futsalInformation_fiSeq = b.fiSeq; WHERE 1=1 AND fpSeq = #{fpSeq} ORDER BY fpSeq DESC

SELECT a.fpSeq, a.reservationDate, a.reservationTime, a.matchingOnOff, a.matchingDeposit, a.matchingBankName, a.matchingBankNumbar, a.matchingVs, a.matchingTeamLevel, a.matchingTeamName, a.matchingTeamIntroduction, a.applicationTeamLevel, a.applicationTeamPhoneNumbar, a.applicationTeamName, a.applicationTeamIntroduction, a.rpDelMy, a.user_suSeq, a.futsalInformation_fiSeq, b.fiSeq AS fiSeq, b.futsalName, b.futsalPrice, b.futsalRegion, b.futsalAddress, b.futsalPhoneNumbar, b.futsalBusinessHours, b.futsalFacilityUsageRules, b.futsalCancellationPolicy, b.fiDelMy, c.suSeq, c.userName, c.userId FROM reservationprocess a LEFT JOIN futsalinformation b ON a.futsalInformation_fiSeq = b.fiSeq LEFT JOIN user c ON a.user_suSeq = c.suSeq WHERE a.fpSeq = #{fpSeq} AND b.fiDelMy = 0 ORDER BY a.fpSeq DESC
